org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard.listeners
Interface WizardListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
WizardTab, WizardTabs
public interface WizardListener

This class defines a WizardListener. The wizard listener is called each time a change in the configuration might change other fields and configuration settings. For example, from a non-distributed mode to a distributed virtual database, new fields need to be set and displayed.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Nicolas Modrzyk
